mapper.select: select r.role_code from employee_role er join role r on r.role_id = er.role_id where er.emp_id = #{empId} order by r.role_id

select e.emp_id as empId, e.login_id as loginId, e.name as name, e.birthday as birthday, e.email as email, e.position as position, d.dept_name as deptName from employee e join department d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id where e.emp_id = #{empId}
